title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5906.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5906.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing declaratory rulings with respect to the applicability to
any person, property or state of facts of any rule or statute enforceable by
the New York State Science and Technology Foundation, or whether any action
taken by it should be taken pursuant to a rule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5906.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
